info.name: QShelter API
info.description:
Complete API collection for QShelter Real Estate Platform.

## Services
- **User Service**: Authentication, users, roles, tenants, organizations, API keys
- **Property Service**: Properties, variants, units, amenities, media
- **Mortgage Service**: Payment plans, payment methods, applications, phases, payments, organization reviews
- **Documents Service**: Document upload and management

## Organizations
External parties (banks, developers, legal) are modeled as Organizations. Their members get special roles (LENDER, DEVELOPER) for multi-party document review workflows.

## Authentication
All requests require the following headers:
- `x-tenant-id`: Your tenant ID
- `x-user-id`: The authenticated user ID

## Base URLs
Set the service URL variables to your environment:
- LocalStack Mortgage: `http://localhost:4566/restapis/{apiId}/localstack/_user_request_`
- LocalStack User: `http://localhost:4566/restapis/{apiId}/localstack/_user_request_`
- LocalStack Property: `http://localhost:4566/restapis/{apiId}/localstack/_user_request_`

variable.description: User ID for tenant membership operations
Target tenant ID for switching tenants
Role ID for tenant membership operations
New role ID for updating member roles
Workflow blocker ID for resolution operations
Questionnaire plan ID for questionnaire operations
Question ID for question operations within a plan
Documentation plan ID for documentation operations
Step ID for step operations within a documentation plan
Bootstrap secret for admin endpoints (use 'local-bootstrap-secret' for local dev)
Event channel ID for event channel operations
Event channel code for lookup by code
Event type ID for event type and handler operations
Event handler ID for handler operations
Customer user ID (e.g., Chidi in the Lekki flow)
Lender user ID (e.g., Nkechi from Access Bank)
Payment plan ID for payment plan operations
Application document ID for review operations
Organization ID (e.g., Access Bank, Lekki Gardens)
Nkechi's user ID (Access Bank mortgage officer)
Emeka's user ID (Lekki Gardens sales manager)

item.name: Event Channels
item.description: Event channels organize event types by category (e.g., MORTGAGE_OPS, USER_ACTIVITY). Channels are created per-tenant.

request.description:
Create an event channel.

**Code Format:**
- Must be uppercase with underscores (e.g., MORTGAGE_OPS)
- Must be unique within the tenant

item.name: Event Types
item.description: Event types define specific events within a channel (e.g., DOWNPAYMENT_COMPLETED under MORTGAGE_OPS). Handlers are attached to event types.

request.description:
Create an event type within a channel.

**Code Format:**
- Must be uppercase with underscores (e.g., DOWNPAYMENT_COMPLETED)
- Must be unique within the channel

item.name: Event Handlers
item.description: Event handlers define actions to trigger when workflow events occur (e.g., send email when phase completes). Handlers are attached to phase or step templates.

request.description:
Create an event handler.

**Handler Types:**
- `SEND_EMAIL` - Send email notification
- `SEND_SMS` - Send SMS
- `SEND_PUSH` - Send push notification
- `CALL_WEBHOOK` - Call external API
- `ADVANCE_WORKFLOW` - Advance workflow step
- `RUN_AUTOMATION` - Execute internal logic
Toggle the enabled/disabled status of an event handler.

item.name: Payment Plans
item.description: Payment plans define the installment structure for phases (frequency, number of installments, interest calculation).

request.description:
Create a new payment plan template.

**Payment Frequency Options:**
- `MONTHLY`
- `BIWEEKLY`
- `WEEKLY`
- `ONE_TIME`
- `CUSTOM`

item.name: Questionnaire Plans
item.description: Questionnaire plans are reusable templates for prequalification/screening forms with scoring capabilities. They define questions, validation rules, and scoring logic.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Prequalification Form",
  "description": "Initial prequalification questionnaire for mortgage applicants",
  "isActive": true,
  "passingScore": 70,
  "scoringStrategy": "SUM",
  "autoDecisionEnabled": true,
  "estimatedMinutes": 10,
  "category": "PREQUALIFICATION",
  "questions": [
    {
      "questionKey": "employment_status",
      "questionText": "What is your current employment status?",
      "helpText": "Select the option that best describes your current employment",
      "questionType": "SELECT",
      "order": 1,
      "isRequired": true,
      "options": [
        {"value": "employed", "label": "Employed", "score": 10},
        {"value": "self_employed", "label": "Self-Employed", "score": 7},
        {"value": "retired", "label": "Retired", "score": 5},
        {"value": "unemployed", "label": "Unemployed", "score": 0}
      ],
      "scoreWeight": 2,
      "category": "employment"
    },
    {
      "questionKey": "annual_income",
      "questionText": "What is your annual gross income?",
      "helpText": "Include salary, bonuses, and other regular income",
      "questionType": "CURRENCY",
      "order": 2,
      "isRequired": true,
      "validationRules": {"min": 0, "max": 10000000},
      "scoringRules": {">=100000": 20, ">=75000": 15, ">=50000": 10, ">=25000": 5},
      "scoreWeight": 3,
      "category": "income"
    },
    {
      "questionKey": "years_employed",
      "questionText": "How many years have you been with your current employer?",
      "questionType": "NUMBER",
      "order": 3,
      "isRequired": true,
      "validationRules": {"min": 0, "max": 50},
      "scoringRules": {">=5": 15, ">=2": 10, ">=1": 5},
      "scoreWeight": 1,
      "showIf": {"questionKey": "employment_status", "equals": "employed"},
      "category": "employment"
    }
  ]
}

request.description:
Create a new questionnaire plan template with questions and scoring rules.

**Question Types:**
- `TEXT` - Free text input
- `NUMBER` - Numeric input
- `CURRENCY` - Monetary value
- `DATE` - Date picker
- `SELECT` - Single selection dropdown
- `MULTI_SELECT` - Multiple selection
- `RADIO` - Radio button selection
- `CHECKBOX` - Checkbox
- `FILE_UPLOAD` - File upload
- `PHONE` - Phone number
- `EMAIL` - Email address
- `ADDRESS` - Full address
- `PERCENTAGE` - Percentage value
- `YEARS_MONTHS` - Duration in years/months

**Scoring Strategies:**
- `SUM` - Add up all scores
- `AVERAGE` - Average of all scores
- `WEIGHTED_SUM` - Sum with weights (score * weight)
- `MIN_ALL` - Must meet minimum on all questions
- `CUSTOM` - Custom scoring logic

**Categories:**
- `PREQUALIFICATION` - Initial eligibility screening
- `AFFORDABILITY` - Income/expense assessment
- `PROPERTY_INTENT` - Property preferences
- `RISK_ASSESSMENT` - Credit/risk questions
- `COMPLIANCE` - KYC/AML questions
- `CUSTOM` - Custom category

response.name: Chidi Lekki - Prequalification Questionnaire Plan

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Mortgage Prequalification",
  "description": "Collects applicant age and income to validate mortgage eligibility",
  "isActive": true,
  "passingScore": 100,
  "scoringStrategy": "MIN_ALL",
  "autoDecisionEnabled": true,
  "estimatedMinutes": 5,
  "category": "PREQUALIFICATION",
  "questions": [
    {
      "questionKey": "applicant_age",
      "questionText": "What is your current age?",
      "helpText": "Your age determines the maximum mortgage term (retirement age is 60)",
      "questionType": "NUMBER",
      "order": 1,
      "isRequired": true,
      "validationRules": {"min": 18, "max": 59},
      "scoringRules": {"<=55": 100, ">55": 0},
      "scoreWeight": 1,
      "category": "eligibility"
    },
    {
      "questionKey": "mortgage_type",
      "questionText": "What type of mortgage are you applying for?",
      "helpText": "Joint mortgages require documentation from both applicants",
      "questionType": "SELECT",
      "order": 2,
      "isRequired": true,
      "options": [
        {"value": "SINGLE", "label": "Single (Individual)", "score": 100},
        {"value": "JOINT", "label": "Joint (With Spouse)", "score": 100}
      ],
      "scoreWeight": 0,
      "category": "application_type"
    },
    {
      "questionKey": "employment_status",
      "questionText": "What is your employment status?",
      "helpText": "This determines the income verification documents required",
      "questionType": "SELECT",
      "order": 3,
      "isRequired": true,
      "options": [
        {"value": "EMPLOYED", "label": "Employed (Salary/Wage earner)", "score": 100},
        {"value": "SELF_EMPLOYED", "label": "Self-Employed", "score": 80},
        {"value": "BUSINESS_OWNER", "label": "Business Owner", "score": 80},
        {"value": "RETIRED", "label": "Retired", "score": 60}
      ],
      "scoreWeight": 1,
      "category": "employment"
    },
    {
      "questionKey": "monthly_income",
      "questionText": "What is your monthly gross income?",
      "helpText": "Include salary, bonuses, and other regular income",
      "questionType": "CURRENCY",
      "order": 4,
      "isRequired": true,
      "validationRules": {"min": 0},
      "scoringRules": {">=500000": 100, "<500000": 0},
      "scoreWeight": 1,
      "category": "affordability"
    },
    {
      "questionKey": "monthly_expenses",
      "questionText": "What are your total monthly expenses?",
      "helpText": "Include rent, utilities, loans, and other recurring expenses",
      "questionType": "CURRENCY",
      "order": 5,
      "isRequired": true,
      "validationRules": {"min": 0},
      "scoreWeight": 0,
      "category": "affordability"
    },
    {
      "questionKey": "desired_term_years",
      "questionText": "What mortgage term (in years) would you prefer?",
      "helpText": "Maximum term is 30 years, but limited by retirement age (60)",
      "questionType": "NUMBER",
      "order": 6,
      "isRequired": true,
      "validationRules": {"min": 5, "max": 30},
      "scoringRules": {">=5": 100, "<5": 0},
      "scoreWeight": 1,
      "category": "preferences"
    }
  ]
}

response.body:
{
  "id": "qplan_prequalification_001",
  "tenantId": "tenant_001",
  "name": "Mortgage Prequalification",
  "description": "Collects applicant age and income to validate mortgage eligibility",
  "isActive": true,
  "passingScore": 100,
  "scoringStrategy": "MIN_ALL",
  "autoDecisionEnabled": true,
  "estimatedMinutes": 5,
  "category": "PREQUALIFICATION",
  "questions": [
    {"id": "q1", "questionKey": "applicant_age", "questionText": "What is your current age?", "questionType": "NUMBER", "order": 1, "isRequired": true},
    {"id": "q2", "questionKey": "mortgage_type", "questionText": "What type of mortgage are you applying for?", "questionType": "SELECT", "order": 2, "isRequired": true},
    {"id": "q3", "questionKey": "employment_status", "questionText": "What is your employment status?", "questionType": "SELECT", "order": 3, "isRequired": true},
    {"id": "q4", "questionKey": "monthly_income", "questionText": "What is your monthly gross income?", "questionType": "CURRENCY", "order": 4, "isRequired": true},
    {"id": "q5", "questionKey": "monthly_expenses", "questionText": "What are your total monthly expenses?", "questionType": "CURRENCY", "order": 5, "isRequired": true},
    {"id": "q6", "questionKey": "desired_term_years", "questionText": "What mortgage term (in years) would you prefer?", "questionType": "NUMBER", "order": 6, "isRequired": true}
  ],
  "createdAt": "2025-01-15T10:10:00.000Z",
  "updatedAt": "2025-01-15T10:10:00.000Z"
}

request.description: Clone an existing questionnaire plan. Use `name` to create a new plan with a different name, or use `incrementVersion: true` to create a new version of the same plan.
Calculate the score for given answers against a questionnaire plan. Returns the total score, max possible score, and whether the applicant passed.

body.raw:
{
  "questionKey": "debt_to_income",
  "questionText": "What is your estimated monthly debt payments?",
  "questionType": "CURRENCY",
  "order": 4,
  "isRequired": true,
  "validationRules": {"min": 0},
  "scoreWeight": 2,
  "category": "financial"
}

item.name: Payment Methods
item.description: Payment methods are templates that define the entire application workflow including phases, steps, and document requirements.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "10/90 Mortgage",
  "description": "10% downpayment, 90% mortgage",
  "isActive": true,
  "allowEarlyPayoff": true,
  "autoActivatePhases": true,
  "phases": [
    {
      "name": "KYC & Documentation",
      "phaseCategory": "DOCUMENTATION",
      "phaseType": "KYC",
      "order": 1,
      "stepDefinitions": [
        {"name": "Upload ID", "stepType": "UPLOAD", "order": 1, "requiredDocumentTypes": ["ID_CARD"]},
        {"name": "Upload Proof of Income", "stepType": "UPLOAD", "order": 2, "requiredDocumentTypes": ["PAYSLIP"]},
        {"name": "Admin Review", "stepType": "REVIEW", "order": 3}
      ]
    },
    {
      "name": "Downpayment",
      "phaseCategory": "PAYMENT",
      "phaseType": "DOWNPAYMENT",
      "order": 2,
      "percentOfPrice": 10,
      "paymentPlanId": "{{downpaymentPlanId}}",
      "collectFunds": true
    },
    {
      "name": "Mortgage",
      "phaseCategory": "PAYMENT",
      "phaseType": "MORTGAGE",
      "order": 3,
      "percentOfPrice": 90,
      "interestRate": 9.5,
      "paymentPlanId": "{{mortgagePlanId}}",
      "collectFunds": false
    }
  ]
}

request.description:
Create a complete payment method template with phases.

**Phase Categories:**
- `DOCUMENTATION` - For KYC, document uploads, reviews
- `PAYMENT` - For collecting payments

**Phase Types:**
- `KYC` - Know Your Customer
- `VERIFICATION` - Document verification
- `DOWNPAYMENT` - Initial payment
- `MORTGAGE` - Long-term financing
- `BALLOON` - Balloon payment
- `CUSTOM`

**Step Types:**
- `UPLOAD` - User uploads document
- `REVIEW` - Admin reviews documents
- `SIGNATURE` - Requires signature
- `APPROVAL` - Requires approval
- `GENERATE_DOCUMENT` - Auto-generate offer letter

response.name: Chidi Lekki - 5-Phase Payment Method (10/90)

body.raw:
{
  "name": "10/90 Lekki Mortgage",
  "description": "Prequalification  Underwriting  Downpayment  Final Documentation  Mortgage",
  "requiresManualApproval": true,
  "phases": [
    {
      "name": "Prequalification",
      "phaseCategory": "QUESTIONNAIRE",
      "phaseType": "PRE_APPROVAL",
      "order": 1,
      "questionnairePlanId": "{{prequalificationPlanId}}"
    },
    {
      "name": "Underwriting & Documentation",
      "phaseCategory": "DOCUMENTATION",
      "phaseType": "KYC",
      "order": 2,
      "documentationPlanId": "{{kycDocumentationPlanId}}"
    },
    {
      "name": "10% Downpayment",
      "phaseCategory": "PAYMENT",
      "phaseType": "DOWNPAYMENT",
      "order": 3,
      "percentOfPrice": 10,
      "paymentPlanId": "{{downpaymentPlanId}}"
    },
    {
      "name": "Final Documentation",
      "phaseCategory": "DOCUMENTATION",
      "phaseType": "VERIFICATION",
      "order": 4,
      "documentationPlanId": "{{finalDocumentationPlanId}}"
    },
    {
      "name": "20-Year Mortgage",
      "phaseCategory": "PAYMENT",
      "phaseType": "MORTGAGE",
      "order": 5,
      "percentOfPrice": 90,
      "interestRate": 9.5,
      "paymentPlanId": "{{mortgagePlanId}}"
    }
  ]
}

response.body:
{
  "id": "pm_10_90_lekki_001",
  "tenantId": "tenant_001",
  "name": "10/90 Lekki Mortgage",
  "description": "Prequalification  Underwriting  Downpayment  Final Documentation  Mortgage",
  "requiresManualApproval": true,
  "isActive": true,
  "phases": [
    {"id": "phase1", "name": "Prequalification", "phaseCategory": "QUESTIONNAIRE", "phaseType": "PRE_APPROVAL", "order": 1},
    {"id": "phase2", "name": "Underwriting & Documentation", "phaseCategory": "DOCUMENTATION", "phaseType": "KYC", "order": 2},
    {"id": "phase3", "name": "10% Downpayment", "phaseCategory": "PAYMENT", "phaseType": "DOWNPAYMENT", "order": 3, "percentOfPrice": 10},
    {"id": "phase4", "name": "Final Documentation", "phaseCategory": "DOCUMENTATION", "phaseType": "VERIFICATION", "order": 4},
    {"id": "phase5", "name": "20-Year Mortgage", "phaseCategory": "PAYMENT", "phaseType": "MORTGAGE", "order": 5, "percentOfPrice": 90, "interestRate": 9.5}
  ],
  "createdAt": "2025-01-15T10:25:00.000Z",
  "updatedAt": "2025-01-15T10:25:00.000Z"
}

request.description:
Add a phase to an existing payment method.

**lockUnitOnComplete:** When set to true, completing this phase locks the property unit for the applicant. Other applications for the same unit will be marked as SUPERSEDED. Only one phase per payment method should have this enabled (typically the downpayment phase).

Update an existing phase.

**lockUnitOnComplete:** When set to true, completing this phase locks the property unit for the applicant. Other applications for the same unit will be marked as SUPERSEDED.
Link a payment method to a property. This makes the payment method available for applications on that property.
Get all payment methods available for a specific property.

Attach an event handler to a phase template.

**Phase Triggers:**
- `ON_ACTIVATE` - Phase becomes current
- `ON_COMPLETE` - Phase completed
- `ON_CANCEL` - Phase cancelled
- `ON_PAYMENT_RECEIVED` - Payment received (PAYMENT phases)
- `ON_ALL_PAYMENTS_RECEIVED` - All payments complete
Get all event attachments for a phase template.

Attach an event handler to a step template.

**Step Triggers:**
- `ON_COMPLETE` - Step completed
- `ON_REJECT` - Step rejected
- `ON_SUBMIT` - Step submitted for review
- `ON_RESUBMIT` - Step resubmitted after rejection
- `ON_START` - Step started
Get all event attachments for a step template.

body.raw:
{
  "rules": [
    {
      "context": "APPLICATION_PHASE",
      "phaseType": "KYC",
      "documentType": "ID_CARD",
      "isRequired": true,
      "description": "Valid government-issued ID (NIN, Passport, or Driver License)",
      "maxSizeBytes": 5242880,
      "allowedMimeTypes": ["image/jpeg", "image/png", "application/pdf"]
    },
    {
      "context": "APPLICATION_PHASE",
      "phaseType": "KYC",
      "documentType": "BANK_STATEMENT",
      "isRequired": true,
      "description": "Last 6 months bank statements",
      "maxSizeBytes": 10485760,
      "allowedMimeTypes": ["application/pdf"],
      "expiryDays": 90
    },
    {
      "context": "APPLICATION_PHASE",
      "phaseType": "KYC",
      "documentType": "EMPLOYMENT_LETTER",
      "isRequired": true,
      "description": "Employment confirmation letter",
      "maxSizeBytes": 5242880,
      "allowedMimeTypes": ["application/pdf"]
    }
  ]
}

request.description: Create multiple document requirement rules for a payment method in a single request. Rules define what documents are required for specific phases (e.g., KYC documents for underwriting phase).
Get all document requirement rules for a payment method. Optionally filter by phase type.
Delete a specific document requirement rule. Only admins can delete rules.

item.name: Documentation Plans
item.description: Documentation plans are reusable templates that define the documents required during mortgage application processing. Each plan consists of steps (document types) that applicants must submit. Steps include validation rules such as allowed MIME types, file size limits, expiry requirements, and manual review flags. These plans can be linked to payment method phases to define what documents are required at each stage.

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Mortgage KYC Documentation",
  "description": "KYC workflow with conditional spouse and business documents based on prequalification answers",
  "isActive": true,
  "requiredDocumentTypes": ["ID_CARD", "BANK_STATEMENT"],
  "steps": [
    {
      "name": "Government ID Upload",
      "stepType": "UPLOAD",
      "order": 1,
      "documentType": "ID_CARD",
      "isRequired": true,
      "description": "Valid government-issued ID (NIN, Passport, or Driver License)",
      "maxSizeBytes": 5242880,
      "allowedMimeTypes": ["application/pdf", "image/jpeg", "image/png"],
      "minFiles": 1,
      "maxFiles": 2
    },
    {
      "name": "Bank Statement Upload",
      "stepType": "UPLOAD",
      "order": 2,
      "documentType": "BANK_STATEMENT",
      "isRequired": true,
      "description": "Last 6 months bank statements",
      "maxSizeBytes": 15728640,
      "allowedMimeTypes": ["application/pdf"],
      "expiryDays": 90,
      "requiresManualReview": true,
      "minFiles": 3,
      "maxFiles": 6
    },
    {
      "name": "Employment Letter (Employed Only)",
      "stepType": "UPLOAD",
      "order": 3,
      "documentType": "EMPLOYMENT_LETTER",
      "isRequired": true,
      "description": "Employment confirmation letter from employer",
      "maxSizeBytes": 5242880,
      "allowedMimeTypes": ["application/pdf"],
      "condition": { "questionKey": "employment_status", "operator": "EQUALS", "value": "EMPLOYED" }
    },
    {
      "name": "Business Registration (Self-Employed Only)",
      "stepType": "UPLOAD",
      "order": 4,
      "documentType": "BUSINESS_REGISTRATION",
      "isRequired": true,
      "description": "CAC registration or business license",
      "maxSizeBytes": 5242880,
      "allowedMimeTypes": ["application/pdf", "image/jpeg"],
      "condition": { "questionKey": "employment_status", "operator": "IN", "values": ["SELF_EMPLOYED", "BUSINESS_OWNER"] }
    },
    {
      "name": "Spouse ID (Joint Mortgage Only)",
      "stepType": "UPLOAD",
      "order": 5,
      "documentType": "SPOUSE_ID_CARD",
      "isRequired": true,
      "description": "Government-issued ID for spouse",
      "maxSizeBytes": 5242880,
      "allowedMimeTypes": ["application/pdf", "image/jpeg", "image/png"],
      "condition": { "questionKey": "mortgage_type", "operator": "EQUALS", "value": "JOINT" }
    },
    {
      "name": "Marriage Certificate (Joint Mortgage Only)",
      "stepType": "UPLOAD",
      "order": 6,
      "documentType": "MARRIAGE_CERTIFICATE",
      "isRequired": true,
      "description": "Marriage certificate or court affidavit",
      "maxSizeBytes": 5242880,
      "allowedMimeTypes": ["application/pdf", "image/jpeg"],
      "condition": { "questionKey": "mortgage_type", "operator": "EQUALS", "value": "JOINT" }
    },
    {
      "name": "Admin Reviews Documents",
      "stepType": "APPROVAL",
      "order": 7
    }
  ]
}

request.description: Create a new documentation plan with predefined steps. Only admins can create plans.

response.name: Chidi Lekki - KYC Documentation Plan (Conditional Steps)

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Mortgage KYC Documentation",
  "description": "Standard KYC documentation workflow with conditional steps",
  "isActive": true,
  "requiredDocumentTypes": ["ID_CARD", "BANK_STATEMENT", "EMPLOYMENT_LETTER"],
  "steps": [
    {
      "name": "Upload Valid ID",
      "stepType": "UPLOAD",
      "order": 1,
      "documentType": "ID_CARD",
      "isRequired": true,
      "description": "Valid government-issued ID (NIN, Passport, or Driver License)",
      "maxSizeBytes": 5242880,
      "allowedMimeTypes": ["image/jpeg", "image/png", "application/pdf"],
      "requiresManualReview": true
    },
    {
      "name": "Upload Bank Statements",
      "stepType": "UPLOAD",
      "order": 2,
      "documentType": "BANK_STATEMENT",
      "isRequired": true,
      "description": "Last 6 months bank statements",
      "maxSizeBytes": 10485760,
      "allowedMimeTypes": ["application/pdf"],
      "expiryDays": 90,
      "requiresManualReview": true,
      "minFiles": 3,
      "maxFiles": 6
    },
    {
      "name": "Upload Employment Letter",
      "stepType": "UPLOAD",
      "order": 3,
      "documentType": "EMPLOYMENT_LETTER",
      "isRequired": true,
      "description": "Employment confirmation letter from your employer",
      "maxSizeBytes": 5242880,
      "allowedMimeTypes": ["application/pdf"],
      "requiresManualReview": true
    },
    {
      "name": "Upload Spouse ID",
      "stepType": "UPLOAD",
      "order": 4,
      "documentType": "SPOUSE_ID",
      "isRequired": true,
      "description": "Valid ID for spouse (required for joint mortgage)",
      "maxSizeBytes": 5242880,
      "allowedMimeTypes": ["image/jpeg", "image/png", "application/pdf"],
      "requiresManualReview": true,
      "condition": {"questionKey": "mortgage_type", "operator": "EQUALS", "value": "JOINT"}
    },
    {
      "name": "Upload Business Registration",
      "stepType": "UPLOAD",
      "order": 5,
      "documentType": "BUSINESS_REGISTRATION",
      "isRequired": true,
      "description": "Business registration certificate (CAC)",
      "maxSizeBytes": 10485760,
      "allowedMimeTypes": ["application/pdf"],
      "requiresManualReview": true,
      "condition": {"questionKey": "employment_status", "operator": "EQUALS", "value": "SELF_EMPLOYED"}
    },
    {
      "name": "Adaeze Reviews Documents",
      "stepType": "APPROVAL",
      "order": 6
    },
    {
      "name": "Lender Uploads Preapproval Letter",
      "stepType": "UPLOAD",
      "order": 7,
      "documentType": "PREAPPROVAL_LETTER",
      "isRequired": true,
      "description": "Preapproval letter from the partner bank confirming mortgage eligibility",
      "maxSizeBytes": 10485760,
      "allowedMimeTypes": ["application/pdf"],
      "requiresManualReview": false,
      "metadata": {"uploadedBy": "LENDER", "expiresInDays": 30}
    },
    {
      "name": "Customer Signs Preapproval Letter",
      "stepType": "SIGNATURE",
      "order": 8
    }
  ]
}

Get all applications that have documents pending review by this organization. Used by bank officers, developer reps, and other external parties to see their review queue.

- Legal/Insurance reviewers

response.name: Nkechi's pending reviews at Access Bank
Emeka's pending reviews at Lekki Gardens

item.name: Application Phases
item.description: Phases are the stages of a application (KYC, Downpayment, Mortgage, etc.)

request.description:
Submit questionnaire answers for a QUESTIONNAIRE phase (prequalification, eligibility, etc.).

**Request Body:**
- `answers`: Array of field answers with `fieldName` (the field key) and `value`

**Response:**
Returns the updated phase with scoring results:
- `questionnaire.completedAt`: When answers were submitted
- `questionnaire.answeredFieldsCount`: Number of fields answered
- `questionnaire.totalScore`: Calculated score based on scoring rules
- `questionnaire.passed`: Whether the applicant passed (based on scoring strategy)
- `questionnaire.autoCompleted`: Whether the phase was auto-completed

**Scoring Strategies:**
- `MIN_ALL`: All fields must pass their individual validation
- `SUM`: Total score must meet passing threshold
- `AVERAGE`: Average score must meet passing threshold
- `WEIGHTED_SUM`: Weighted total score must meet threshold

response.name: Chidi Lekki - Prequalification Answers (Age 40, 2.5M Income, 20yr Term)
response.body:

  "id": "phase1",
  "name": "Prequalification",

  "phaseCategory": "QUESTIONNAIRE",
  "questionnaire": {
    "completedAt": "2025-01-15T11:10:00.000Z",
    "answeredFieldsCount": 6,
    "totalScore": 100,
    "passed": true,
    "autoCompleted": true,
    "answers": {
      "applicant_age": "40",
      "mortgage_type": "SINGLE",
      "employment_status": "EMPLOYED",
      "monthly_income": "2500000",
      "monthly_expenses": "800000",

    }
  },
  "message": "Prequalification passed. Chidi qualifies for max 20-year term (retirement age 60 - current age 40). KYC phase auto-activated with conditional steps evaluated."
}

- INSURER: Insurance companies

item.name: Admin Bootstrap
item.description: Admin endpoints for tenant bootstrapping. Protected by bootstrap secret.

header.description: Bootstrap secret from SSM or environment

request.description:
Reset the database by deleting all data. Call this before bootstrap to start fresh.

**Requires**: `x-bootstrap-secret` header

header.description: Bootstrap secret from SSM or environment

request.description:
Bootstrap a new tenant with default roles and first admin user. Creates 7 roles:
- **admin**: Full platform access
- **user**: Basic customer access
- **mortgage_ops**: Mortgage operations
- **finance**: Financial operations
- **legal**: Legal/conveyancing
- **DEVELOPER**: Property developer access (assigned to developer org members)
- **LENDER**: Bank/lender access (assigned to bank org members)

Idempotent - safe to call multiple times with same subdomain.

header.description: Bootstrap secret from SSM or environment

request.description: Check if a tenant has been bootstrapped. Returns tenant info, roles, and admins.
